metadata.Title: CVE-2021-40970 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - negligible.
metadata.Description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in templates/installer/step-004.inc.php in spotweb 1.5.1 and below allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the username parameter.

notes.Note: seth-arnold> I don't think the installer is in the binary package

criterions.comment: spotweb: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
